name: gnaw
content:
gnaw verb [I + prep, T]
(BITE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to bite or chew something repeatedly, usually making a hole in it or gradually destroying it: Babies like to gnaw hard objects when they're teething.gnaw on A dog lay under the table, gnawing on a bone.
